page.title: 16Annual events in Aith
page.content: {The Lifeboat Gala.}Every July a fundraising gala is held in aid of the lifeboat funds. About 200-300 people come to it. There are sideshows, snacks and a sale for the lifeboat fund. There are trips on the lifeboat and a helicopter rescue display. There are dinghy races, a craft show, a cross-country race and pony rides. Afterwards, there is a dance in the hall. {The Regatta.}There are no sailing boats in Aith itself at the moment but a regatta is held each June and boats come from all over the islands to compete. There are various races for different kinds of boat. In the evening the trophies are presented and there is a dance in the hall.
